Module Soft_Eng
Package connec

Class SimpleClient

java.lang.Object
connec.SimpleClient
public class SimpleClient
extends java.lang.Object
Class name : SimpleClient This thread is responsible to handle client connection from the client side. Version : 1.0 Date : 29/05/2020

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    User connectedAccount
    User variable to identify an user's account that is currently connected
    boolean messageSent
    This boolean is used to tell if a message has been sent or not

    This string will contain the user's message
